a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-BAD₃-IGI-ia lu-u šul-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia {LU₂}da-a.a-li-ia ša ina ŠA₃ KUR-i šu-nu-u-ni {LU₂}EME šu-u₂ ša TA@v {URU}ir-gi-is-ti-a-ni a-na x x {1}a-ri-e a-na KUR-i il-lik-u-ni {LU₂}da-a.a-li-ia iṣ-ṣab-tu-ni-šu₂ a-sa-ʾa-al-šu₂ mu-ku mi-i-nu ṭe₃-e-mu ša {KUR}URI-a.a ma-a {KUR}e-ti-na-a.a x+x x x x ma-a x il x is-x+x x x ma-a x la-a u₂-ṣa x+x x x
